review: Overall not bad. However, I had a few complaints. 1) sometimes I still need to wait for it to catch up. 2) remote is small with curved bottom, probably to be ergonomic. I have large hands so sometimes its difficult to handle. The curved bottom also makes it difficult to leave on a table to push the buttons. 3) the voice search understands well, but didn't search other apps like hulu and netflix. It searched Amazon only. 4) cannot control download quality feed to manage data usage. 5) little expensive compared to firestick and chromecast.Good things: set up easily, small, relatively fast scrolling and searching.

review: Amazing steaming device. I own all the main stream including Appletv, roku3, roku stick and Chromecast. By far this the best. The interface is snappy and responsive. The layout of the GUI is good and the voice search is great.The only complaints I have is that the voice search only works for apps and Amazon Prine and purchasable content. Not a deal breaker by any means but it would be nice to open netflix app and then be able to use the voice search.The system works well with Plex apps. The app is far better than the current Roku version, although there is a new roku beta that should get them caught up.Believe me, after owning every platform I wish I had one of these in every room instead of the hodgepodge I have today.
